verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David אוֹדְךָ֥ <WH3034> I will praise בְכָל־ <WH3605> all לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> thee with my whole heart נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> before the gods אֲזַמְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH2167> will I sing praise

אֶשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֨ה <WH7812> I will worship אֶל־ <WH413> toward הֵיכַ֪ל <WH1964> temple קָדְשְׁךָ֡ <WH6944> toward thy holy וְא֘וֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> and praise אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמֶ֗ךָ <WH8034> thy name עַל־ <WH5921> according חַסְדְּךָ֥ <WH2617> for thy lovingkindness וְעַל־ <WH5921> according אֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <WH571> and for thy truth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִגְדַּ֥לְתָּ <WH1431> for thou hast magnified עַל־ <WH5921> according כָּל־ <WH3605> to all שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> above all thy name אִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH565> thy word

בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> In the day קָ֭רָֽאתִי <WH7121> when I cried וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> thou answeredst תַּרְהִבֵ֖נִי <WH7292> me [and] strengthenedst בְנַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> in my soul עֹֽז׃ <WH5797> me [with] strength

יוֹד֣וּךָ <WH3034> shall praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> thee O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> All the kings אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth כִּ֥י <WH3588> When שָׁ֝מְע֗וּ <WH8085> when they hear אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> the words פִֽיךָ׃ <WH6310> of thy mouth

וְ֭יָשִׁירוּ <WH7891> Yea they shall sing בְּדַרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> in the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> For גָ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> for great כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> [is] the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כִּי־ <WH3588> though רָ֣ם <WH7311> [be] high יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Though the LORD וְשָׁפָ֣ל <WH8217> unto the lowly יִרְאֶ֑ה <WH7200> yet hath he respect וְ֝גָבֹ֗הַּ <WH1364> but the proud מִמֶּרְחָ֥ק <WH4801> afar off יְיֵדָֽע׃ <WH3045> he knoweth

אִם־ <WH518> Though אֵלֵ֤ךְ ׀ <WH1980> walk בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst צָרָ֗ה <WH6869> of trouble תְּחַ֫יֵּ֥נִי <WH2421> thou wilt revive עַ֤ל <WH5921> against אַ֣ף <WH639> against the wrath אֹ֭יְבַי <WH341> of mine enemies תִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> me thou shalt stretch forth יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> thine hand וְת֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> shall save יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> and thy right hand

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> The LORD יִגְמֹ֪ר <WH1584> will perfect בַּ֫עֲדִ֥י <WH1157> what יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD חַסְדְּךָ֣ <WH2617> [that which] concerneth me thy mercy לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever מַעֲשֵׂ֖י <WH4639> not the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> of thine own hands אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּֽרֶף׃ <WH7503> forsake
